snippet.title: Vic magazine-reading home invader arrested
snippet.content: A police officer has been injured while arresting an alleged burglar who was found flicking through magazines in a home in Melbourne. A Frankston woman called police when she discovered an unknown man in her home during the early hours of Friday morning, and when police arrived the magazine-reading home invader resisted arrest, injuring an officer. The 27-year old Frankston man was taken to hospital under police guard for facial injuries suffered during the arrest and is expected to be interviewed on Friday morning. Originally published as
